AoS - Gloomspite Gitz 2000pts - Murkrott's Cave Crawlas (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Destruction - Gloomspite Gitz) [2,000pts]

    • Leader [460pts]

      • Funggot Brainbuster - Fungoid Cave-Shaman [90pts]

        Selections: 2. Itchy Nuisance, Arcane Bolt, Moon-sickle, Mystic Shield, Spore Maws, Spore Squig's Vicious Teeth

        Categories: WIZARD, Leader, HERO, DESTRUCTION, GROT, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, MOONCLAN

        Magic: Fungoid Cave-Shaman, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Itchy Nuisance, Mystic Shield, Spore Maws, Unit: Fungoid Cave-Shaman, Unit Abilities: Deffcap Mushroom, Mouthpiece of Mork, Spore Squig, Weapon: Moon-sickle, Spore Squig's Vicious Teeth


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Fungoid Cave-Shaman 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Spore Maws, one other from the Lore of the Moonclan
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Itchy Nuisance 6If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit fights at the end of the next combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight in that combat phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Spore Maws 7If successfully cast, each enemy unit within D6" of the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Fungoid Cave-Shaman 5"446+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deffcap Mushroom Once per battle, this model can attempt to cast 1 extra spell in your hero phase.
        Mouthpiece of Mork If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+ you receive 1 extra command point.
        Spore Squig Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 4+ the wound or mortal wound is negated.

Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units. It may not move in the subsequent movement phase.

      • Skritchit Evileye - Webspinner Shaman on Arachnarok Spider [280pts]

        Selections: 2. Headdress of Many Eyes, 4. Sneaky Distraction, Arcane Bolt, Chitinous Legs, Crooked Spears, Monstrous Fangs, Mystic Shield, Spider God Staff, Spider-bows, Venom of the Spider God, Wounds Suffered

        Categories: SPIDERFANG, Leader, DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, HERO, MONSTER, WIZARD, WEBSPINNER SHAMAN, Behemoth

        Artefact: Headdress of Many Eyes, Magic: Webspinner Shaman on Arachnarok Spider, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Sneaky Distraction, Venom of the Spider God, Unit: Webspinner Shaman on Arachnarok Spider, Unit Abilities: Catchweb Spidershrine, Prophet of the Spider God, Spider Venom, Wall Crawler, Weapon: Chitinous Legs, Crooked Spears, Monstrous Fangs, Spider God Staff, Spider-bows, Wound Track Arachnarok: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Headdress of Many Eyes Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target the bearer.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref

        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Sneaky Distraction 7If successfully cast, until your next hero phase subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.
        Venom of the Spider God 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly SPIDERFANG unit wholly within 16" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, double the number of mortal wounds inflicted by that unit’s Spider Venom ability. If the casting roll is 10 or more, pick up to D3 different friendly SPIDERFANG units instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Webspinner Shaman on Arachnarok Spider *1464+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Catchweb Spidershrine Add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for friendly SPIDERFANG WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any friendly models with this ability.
        Prophet of the Spider God If this model is the general of your army, you can add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly SPIDERFANG units wholly within 24" of this model.
        Spider Venom If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this model’s Monstrous Fangs is 6, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Wall Crawler When this model makes a move, it can pass across terrain features in the same manner as a model that can fly.

    • Battalion [1,450pts]

      • Battalion: Stomping Megamob [1,450pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: One-track Minds

        • Troglodyte Stenkrash - Aleguzzler Gargant [160pts]

          Selections: 'Eadbutt, Massive Club, Mighty Kick, Wounds Suffered

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, MONSTER, ALEGUZZLER, Behemoth

          Unit: Aleguzzler Gargant, Unit Abilities: Drunken Stagger, Stuff 'Em In Me Bag, Timber!, Weapon: 'Eadbutt, Massive Club, Mighty Kick, Wound Track Aleguzzler: 00-02, 03-04, 05-07, 08-09, 10+

        • Murkrott Rockgouger - Dankhold Troggboss [250pts]

          Selections: Boulder Club, Crushing Grip, General - Troggboss , Shepherd of Idiotic Destruction

          Categories: DANKHOLD, TROGGOTH, DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, HERO, Leader

          Command Abilities: Instinctive Leader, Command Trait: Shepherd of Idiotic Destruction, Unit: Dankhold Troggboss, Unit Abilities: Crushing Grip, Magical Resistance, Reassuring Presence, Regeneration, Squigly-beast Followers, Weapon: Boulder Club, Crushing Grip

        • Da Grotto-Skulkas - Fellwater Troggoths [300pts]

          Selections: 2x 3 Fellwater Troggoths [300pts], Noxious Vomit, Spiked Club

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, TROGGOTH, Other, FELLWATER

          Unit: Fellwater Troggoths, Unit Abilities: Regeneration, Terrible Stench, Weapon: Noxious Vomit, Spiked Club

        • Da Murkdwellas - Fellwater Troggoths [300pts]

          Selections: 2x 3 Fellwater Troggoths [300pts], Noxious Vomit, Spiked Club

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, TROGGOTH, Other, FELLWATER

          Unit: Fellwater Troggoths, Unit Abilities: Regeneration, Terrible Stench, Weapon: Noxious Vomit, Spiked Club

        • Da Krag-Krushas - Rockgut Troggoths [280pts]

          Selections: 2x 3 Rockgut Troggoths [280pts], Massive Stone Maul

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, GLOOMSPITE GITZ, TROGGOTH, Other, ROCKGUT

          Unit: Rockgut Troggoths, Unit Abilities: Regeneration, Stony Skin, Throwin' Boulders, Weapon: Massive Stone Maul


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        One-track Minds Units from this battalion can retreat and still shoot and/or charge later in the same turn.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Instinctive Leader Use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly DANKHOLD TROGGOTH HERO with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly TROGGOTH units wholly within 18" of that model when they attack.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Shepherd of Idiotic Destruction If this general is part of your army and on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Aleguzzler Gargant *1265+
        Dankhold Troggboss 6"1274+
        Fellwater Troggoths 6"455+
        Rockgut Troggoths 6"455+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crushing Grip Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Crushing Grip. Instead, pick 1 enemy model that is in range of the attack and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Wounds characteristic of that model, it is slain.
        Drunken Stagger If a charge roll for this model is a double, this model cannot make a charge move that phase. In addition, the players must roll off. The player who wins the roll-off picks a point on the battlefield 3" from this model. Each unit within 2" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Magical Resistance Each time this unit is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on this model.
        Reassuring Presence Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly GLOOMSPITE GITZ units that are wholly within 18" of any friendly models with this ability.
        Regeneration In your hero phase, you can roll a dice for this unit. If you do so, on a 4+ heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this unit.
        Squigly-beast Followers At the start of the combat phase, roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly models with this ability. If the roll is equal to or greater than the number of models in that enemy unit, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Stony Skin Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit. On a 5+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Stuff 'Em In Me Bag After this model piles in, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of this model and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or greater than double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Terrible Stench Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit.
        Throwin' Boulders In your shooting phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this unit and visible to it, and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in this unit, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Timber! If this model is slain, before removing the model from the battlefield the players must roll off. The player who wins the roll-off picks a point on the battlefield 3" from this model. Each unit within 2" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds. This model is then removed from the battlefield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        'Eadbutt Melee1"14+3+-3*
        Boulder Club Melee2"43+3+-2D6
        Crushing Grip Melee1"1****
        Massive Club Melee3"*3+3+-11
        Massive Stone Maul Melee2"23+3+-23

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Gloomspite Gitz

          Selections: Glogg's Megamob, Light of the Bad Moon

          Battle Trait: Bad Moon Magic, Fangz of the Bad Moon, Loonatic Inspiration, Lunar Squigs, Moonclan Fungus Brew, Spiderfang Venom, The Bad Moon, Troggoth Renewal, Command Abilities: Oblivious to Sorcery, Unit Abilities: Monstrous Regeneration


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Bad Moon Magic Add 1 to casting rolls for WIZARDS affected by the light of the Bad Moon if they have the GLOOMSPITE GITZ keyword, and subtract 1 from casting rolls for WIZARDS affected by the light of the Bad Moon that do not have the GLOOMSPITE GITZ keyword.
        Fangz of the Bad Moon If your army is a Gloomspite Gitz army, at the start of your hero phase you can pick 1 enemy unit and roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in that unit affected by the light of the Bad Moon, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Loonatic Inspiration If your general has the GLOOMSPITE GITZ keyword and is affected by the light of the Bad Moon at the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Lunar Squigs If all of the models in a friendly SQUIG unit are affected by the light of the Bad Moon at the start of your charge phase, that unit can attempt to charge even if it ran in the same turn.
        Moonclan Fungus Brew You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by MOONCLAN GROT models while they are affected by the light of the Bad Moon.
        Spiderfang Venom While a SPIDERFANG model is affected by the light of the Bad Moon, its Spider Venom ability causes mortal wounds on an unmodified hit roll of 5+ instead of 6.
        The Bad Moon If any of the armies in a battle are Gloomspite Gitz armies, at the start of the first battle round, before determining who has the first turn, the player commanding the Gloomspite Gitz army must pick one corner of the battlefield as the starting location of the Bad Moon. If both players have Gloomspite Gitz armies, then they must roll off and the winner picks the starting location. The Bad Moon is located at the edge of the battlefield in that corner, and its direction of travel is always diagonally across the map from its starting location. Starting from the second battle round, before determining who has the first turn, the player commanding the Gloomspite Gitz army must roll a dice. On a 1, the Bad Moon does not move. On a 2-5, it makes 1 move. On a 6, it makes 2 moves. Each move takes the Bad Moon from its current location along its direction of travel to the next location shown on the map. When a move takes the Bad Moon to the opposite edge of the battlefield, it is removed and has no further effect on the battle. The location of the Bad Moon determines which models are affected by its light. If the Bad Moon’s location is at the edge of the battlefield, its light does not affect any units. If the Bad Moon’s location is in a quarter, its light affects models wholly within the same quarter of the battlefield as its location. If the Bad Moon’s location is at the center of the battlefield, its light affects all models on the battlefield.
        Troggoth Renewal If all of the models in a friendly TROGGOTH unit are affected by the light of the Bad Moon when it uses its Regeneration ability, you can reroll the dice that determines if the ability heals any wounds, or you can double the number of wounds that are healed by the ability if the first roll is successful.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Oblivious to Sorcery You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly GLOGG'S MEGAMOB FELLWATER TROGGOTH or GLOGG'S MEGAMOB ROCKGUT TROGGOTH unit wholly within 12" of a friendly GLOGG'S MEGAMOB DANKHOLD HERO. Until you next hero phase, each time that unit is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Monstrous Regeneration Add 1 to the dice that determines if a friendly GLOGG'S MEGAMOB TROGGOTH unit heals any wounds when it uses its Regeneration ability.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [90pts]

      • Endless Spell: Emerald Lifeswarm [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, EMERALD LIFESWORM, GHYRAN, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm, Unit Abilities: Bounteous Healing, Empowered by Ghyran, Fly, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Emerald Lifeswarm 6If successfully cast, set up an Emerald Lifeswarm model wholly within 15" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bounteous Healing After this model is set up or after it has moved, pick 1 unit within 1" of it. You can either heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are currently allocated to the unit, you may return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic equal to or less than the roll of a D3.
        Empowered by Ghyran If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Life, roll a D6 to determine the number of wounds healed or wounds worth of slain models returned by the Emerald Lifeswarm’s Bounteous Healing ability.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory An Emerald Lifeswarm is a predatory endless spell. Emerald Lifeswarms can move up to 10" and can fly.

      • Endless Spell: Scrapskuttle's Arachnacauldron [40pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron, Unit Abilities: Blessings of the Cauldron, Bloodslither Pact


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron 5Only GLOOMSPITE GITZ can attempt to cast this spell. If successfully cast, set up a Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron model within 1" of the caster. As long as the Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron is not dispelled, the caster and the Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron are treated as being a single model from the caster’s army that uses the caster’s warscroll as well as the Endless Spells rules. The Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron must remain within 1" of the caster. If the caster is slain, then the Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron is immediately dispelled and removed from play along with the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blessings of the Cauldron As long as Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron is not dispelled, add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for the caster, and the caster knows all of the spells from the Lore of the Moonclans.
        Bloodslither Pact When the Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron is set up, and at the start of each of the caster’s hero phases after it is set up, you must pick 1 unit within 3" of the caster. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Note that this means that if there are no other units within 3" of the caster, then the caster will suffer the mortal wounds.
